PH Series Compatibility

JST PH Series Cable Assembly

Complete range of JST PH-compatible cable assemblies with 2.0mm pitch wire-to-board connectors. Custom wire lengths, configurations, and quick-turn delivery from our ISO 9001 certified factory.

JST PH Series Specifications

Pitch
2.0mm
Positions
2-15
Voltage Rating
100V
Current Rating
2A

PH Series Product Range

PH Series Receptacle Housings

Wire-side housings with friction lock mechanism for secure connections.

2-Pin Housing SFR-001
3-Pin Housing SFR-002
4-Pin Housing SFR-004
5-Pin Housing SFR-005
6-Pin to 15-Pin Available

PH Series PCB Headers

Through-hole and surface mount headers for PCB mounting.

2-Pin Header THT HDR-PH02
3-Pin Header THT HDR-PH03
4-Pin Header THT HDR-PH04
SMT Options Available
Right-Angle Available

PH Series Crimp Terminals

Tin-plated copper terminals for reliable wire crimp connections.

  • ▸ Wire gauge: 28-24 AWG standard
  • ▸ Material: Tin-plated copper
  • ▸ Packaging: Bulk or reel
  • ▸ Crimp tooling available

Custom PH Cable Assemblies

Complete cable assemblies with PH connectors on one or both ends.

  • ▸ Custom wire lengths
  • ▸ Various wire gauges
  • ▸ Color-coded wires
  • ▸ Strain relief options
  • ▸ Mixed position counts

Key Features of PH Series

Ultra-Compact 2.0mm Pitch

Industry-leading compact design for high-density PCB layouts in space-constrained devices.

Friction Lock Design

Secure connection retention without additional locking mechanisms.

PA66 GF Material

Glass-filled polyamide housing with UL94V-0 flame rating for safety.

Multi-Position Options

Available in 2 through 15 position configurations for various application requirements.

PH Series Applications

Consumer Electronics

Smartphones, tablets, wearables, portable devices requiring compact connections.

Computer Peripherals

Internal PCB connections, power delivery, signal routing in computer equipment.

LED Lighting

LED strip connections, low-profile lighting fixtures, compact driver interfaces.

Automotive Electronics

Dashboard modules, sensor connections, infotainment systems.

IoT Devices

Smart home devices, sensors, controllers with space constraints.

Medical Devices

Portable medical equipment, patient monitoring systems.

Custom PH Cable Assembly Options

Option Choices
Wire Length Custom lengths from 10mm to 5 meters
Wire Gauge 32 AWG to 20 AWG (application dependent)
Wire Color Standard colors or custom color coding
Strain Relief Overmold, heat shrink, or mechanical
Shielding Foil, braid, or foil + braid options
Connector Configurations PH-PH, PH-wire open, mixed series
Labeling Custom labels and markings available
